External Resources
==================

Tools
-----

- `Pipenv <https://pipenv.pypa.io/en/latest/>`_: Tool for managing Python project dependencies.
- `Makefile <https://www.gnu.org/software/make/>`_: Tool for automating tasks, often used in conjunction with Python projects.
- `Docker <https://www.docker.com/>`_: Platform for developing, shipping, and running applications using containerization.

Packages
--------

- `aiomysql <https://pypi.org/project/aiomysql/>`_: Asynchronous MySQL client library for Python.
- `cryptography <https://cryptography.io/>`_: Cryptographic library for Python.
- `anyio <https://github.com/agronholm/anyio>`_: Asynchronous framework compatibility layer for Python.
- `sphinx <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/>`_: Documentation generator for Python projects.
- `sphinx-rtd-theme <https://sphinx-rtd-theme.readthedocs.io/en/stable/>`_: Read the Docs theme for Sphinx.
- `ghp-import <https://github.com/c-w/ghp-import>`_: Tool for importing a Sphinx documentation tree into a GitHub Pages branch.

Development Packages
--------------------

- `pre-commit <https://pre-commit.com/>`_: Framework for managing and maintaining multi-language pre-commit hooks.
- `isort <https://pycqa.github.io/isort/>`_: Python utility to sort imports alphabetically within specified sections of the file.
- `black <https://black.readthedocs.io/en/stable/>`_: Uncompromising Python code formatter.
- `mypy <https://mypy.readthedocs.io/en/stable/>`_: Static type checker for Python.
- `pytest <https://pytest.org/>`_: Testing framework for Python.
- `pytest-asyncio <https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest-asyncio>`_: Pytest plugin for asyncio support.
- `pytest-cov <https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest-cov>`_: Pytest plugin for measuring test coverage.

Requires
--------

- `Python <https://www.python.org/>`_: Python programming language, version 3.12
